title: ayuden a difundir este post sobre las en reddit

embed.description: After seeing how every server had similar problems like this on past three years, i want to talk about LAS server right now (while im "Attempting to reconnect" on game). Its been more than a entirely month, since christmas, that everyday (not lying, i can post the "riot answer" of every single day the server had the same problem) half of the server is shutdown.

body:
gente claramente estamos todos cansados y nadie de las riot nos da ni 2 pesos,
un compañero creo este post
https://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/43y2cd/its_our_turn_can_las_have_some_attention_from/?ref=share&ref_source=link
en reddit para que lo vean alguien de riot na y nos puedan dar alguna solucion
si todos lo votamos podemos llegar a la hot page para que nos vean y que nos dejen de boludear de una ves por todas
+1

replies.body: Que paso? ya habia hecho +1 en reddit y todo jaja
